item.description:
Hola, que tal?  Join me for Mexican food at Puerto Vallarta in Newington 6/20/12 at 7:00pm.  I will be there by 6:45 so I can indulge in a much needed margarita.  I like this place because I can get dinner for under $10.00 or order more and have leftovers - I always do because I love combo platters.

It's great to have time to do Meetups again, and I hope to see you there.  I will collect $1.00 each from attendees.  Bring a song request for the wandering musicians.  Be prepared to eat on the patio if the weather's nice.

Website:  http://www.puertovallartausa.com/locations.asp

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Puerto Vallarta - Newington
